name: Utopia Global Wellness
description: Welcome to Utopia Global Wellness (UGW) - Where Integrated Workplace Well-Being Meets Belonging--Worldwide! We are your B2B SaaS digital HR and retention partner, combating burnout while elevating employee health, happiness, and productivity on a global scale.
one_liner: Welcome to Utopia Global Wellness (UGW) - Where Integrated Workplace Well-Being Meets Belonging--Worldwide! We are your B2B SaaS digital HR and retention partner, combating burnout while elevating employee health, happiness, and productivity on a global scale.
